game.name: Codelock
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Explore a procedurally generated underground military base, complete vital tasks, and escape alive. But beware—malfunctioning systems, limited bullets and horrific creatures stand between you and victory.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore a procedurally generated underground military base, complete vital tasks, and escape alive. But beware—malfunctioning systems, limited bullets and horrific creatures stand between you and victory.
